name: Chroma Overdrive
description:
Chroma Overdrive builds on the reflex and speed based gameplay of the original, coupled with new 6 new modes and a new awards system.  Move your power orb to match the color of incoming bullets. Try to keep up! Get three strikes and you'll have to try again.

Test your color and reflex skills in nine different modes:

  • Dual: Blue and Orange
  • RGB: Red, Green, and Blue
  • Monochrome: White, Gray, and Black
  • Fire: Yellow, Orange, and Red
  • CMYK: Cyan, Magenta, Yellow, and Black
  • Plus: White, Red, Blue, Yellow, and Green
  • Lightning: White, Blue, Cyan, Purple, and Magenta
  • Ultimate: White, Red, Yellow, Green, Blue, Orange, Lime Green, Teal, and Purple
  • Random: Nine random Colors

Credits
Created with GameMaker:Studio 1.4
Sounds made with Chiptone
Music made with Beepbox
